title: The New Flamin' Hot Cheetos Bagel Will Spice Up Your Life | Letty B | Y93
text:
The New Flamin' Hot Cheetos Bagel Will Spice Up Your Life 1 hour ago A video posted by The Bagel Nook (@the_bagel_nook) on Jan 28, 2017 at 4:26am PST 
Source Instagram 
We’ve seen some pretty interesting bagel creations lately including the Oreo Bagel and the ever-so-popular rainbow bagel, which both received a lot of attention online last year. However, I don’t think anyone expected the latest in bagel trends – a Flamin’ Hot Cheetos bagel! 
This spicy snack can be found at The Bagel Nook, a bagel shop in Freehold, New Jersey. The makers recommend eating the Hot Cheetos bagel with ranch cream cheese, or ghost pepper chili cream cheese – that is, if you can handle double the spice. 
Apparently, the food review Instagram account Junk Banter also alleged the snack helps cure hangovers! A photo posted by JunkBanter.com  (@junkbanter) on Jan 29, 2017 at 11:11am PST 
Source Instagram
